task.title: Add a Trashed Item Back into an App
task.shortdesc: If you trash an item in ModQ, you can add it back into the App using a Social Search.

step.cmd: Select a Social Source (for example, Twitter or Instagram).
Select the three dots in lower right hand corner of the content.
Click Publish to publish the content to the correct App.
step.info: WARNING: Do not select Bulk Clear in ModQ. If you select Bulk Clear, all content is removed from ModQ. To add the content back into ModQ, you must perform a social search for review and approval.
